amendment.description: Amendment improves federal coordination in addressing the documented decline of managed and native pollinators and promotes the long-term viability of honey bee, wild bees, and other beneficial insects in agriculture.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to improve federal coordination in addressing the documented decline of managed and native pollinators and promotes the long-term viability of honey bee, wild bees, and other beneficial insects in agriculture.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 273 - 149 (Roll no. 261).
